title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala - Delicate Divine Necklace
materials: Seed Pearls. Features exquisite Nakshi work with Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This elegant necklace showcases a traditional Lakshmi pendant intricately crafted with Nakshi work. The pendant is adorned with delicate CZ stones, ruby accents, and pearl drops, creating a harmonious blend of sparkle and tradition. The links are interspersed with CZ studded paisley motifs and ruby detailing adding to the necklace's subtle charm. Temple design influences evident in pendant detailing.
occasions: and half-saree functions (Half Saree Function). Also suitable for elegant evening events and adding a touch of cultural heritage to any outfit.
description: This Lakshmi Kasu Mala is a stunning blend of tradition and elegance. The high-quality gold and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and heirloom value. The Lakshmi pendant symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful and cherished piece. Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting luster.
